sections.description: Intrace is an elegant and simple designed theme template for WordPress fullsite editing and fully compatible with Gutenverse plugin. Intraceâ€™s created especially for Interior Designer, Architecture, Real Estate and Furniture Designer websites. This template has a beautiful and unique design with a 100% responsive and easy to customize layout. The templates includes both core version and Gutenverse plugin version, also has core and Gutenverse block patterns ready so you can start mix and match your template parts as you desire. The templates is built ready so you don't need to build it from scratch. We want to make your experience using WordPress fullsite editor more convenient.
